QuestData.Title: Bane of the Illidari
QuestData.Description: <David gathers his smithing supplies.>$B$BYou've done well in getting everything we'll need to reforge the anti-demon blade. Your hard work and dedication is about to be repaid.$B$BThe time has come to forge the sword.
QuestData.LogDescription: Wait for David Wayne to finish forging a sword for you.
QuestData.RewardText: <David mops sweat from his brow.>$B$BThe bulk of the work is done, but to set the magics, the blade must now be quenched.
